summary: Inspired by Tumbleworld, this mod adds descriptions to un-modded shouts in a mad Sheogorath way.
descriptionHtml: Inspired by the mod \"Uncle Sheogorath\" by Tumbleworld, this mod changes the standard Bethesda Shout Descriptions into madness! In the shout sections of the magic menu, it changes ordinary vanilla shout descriptions. As far as I know, it works with other mods as well as SKYUI. Any comments or suggestions, please leave them in the comments section. Thank you!
author: Darknight2694
